      • executeEvents

        protected boolean executeEvents(EventType _eventtype)
                         throws EFapsException
        The method gets all events for the given EventType and executes them in the given order. If no events are defined, nothing is done. The method return TRUE if a event was found, otherwise FALSE.
        Parameters:
        _eventtype - trigger events to execute
        Returns:
        true if a trigger was found and executed, otherwise false
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • getNewValuesMap

        protected final Map<Attribute,Object[]> getNewValuesMap()
        Returns:
        the map of new values send to the triggers

      • executeWithoutAccessCheck

        public void executeWithoutAccessCheck()
                               throws EFapsException
        Executes the update without checking the access rights (but with triggers).
        1. executes the pre update trigger (if exists)
        2. executes the override trigger (if exists)
        3. executes if no override trigger exists or the override trigger is not executed the update (executeWithoutTrigger())
        4. executes the post update trigger (if exists)
        Throws:
        EFapsException - thrown from executeWithoutTrigger() or when the Status is invalid
        See Also:
        executeWithoutTrigger()

      • executeWithoutTrigger

        public void executeWithoutTrigger()
                           throws EFapsException
        The update is done without calling triggers and check of access rights.
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if update not possible (unique key, object does not exists, etc...)
